metadata.title: CVE-2016-5702 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3, when the environment lacks a PHP_SELF value,allows remote attackers to conduct cookie-attribute injection attacks via acrafted URI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5702` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
